Element.Title: Second dress for half the price!

second-dress-for-half-price

In the period from July 15 to August 17, 2013, all the stores of our network there are special discounts dresses and summer dresses of the women's and children's collections: all shoppers can get discount 50% the second thing!

In the period from July 15 to 17 August 2013 inclusive, all the stores of our network there are special discounts dresses and summer dresses of the women's and children's collections: all shoppers can get discount 50% the second thing!
